Package org.jsimpledb.kv.raft.net

Networking classes used by Raft.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Network
    Abstraction layer representing "the network", over which we communicate with other nodes.
    Network.Handler
    Callback interface used by Network implementations.
    SelectorSupport.IOHandler
    Callback interface used by SelectorSupport.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SelectorSupport
    Support superclass for classes that perform NIO selection operations.
    TCPNetwork
    Network implementation based on TCP sockets.
